scripts.dev-sms: cross-env target=dev npm run dev -w=sms-pages | cross-env target=dev npm run dev -w=sms-service
scripts.dev-fileServer: npm run dev -w=file-pages | npm run dev -w=file-service
scripts.build-sms: npm run build -w=sms-pages | npm run build -w=sms-service
scripts.dev-pushMsg: cross-env target=dev pnpm --filter push-msg-page dev | cross-env target=dev pnpm --filter push-msg-server dev
